at.irian.ankor.session

Interface ModelSession


  • public interface ModelSession
    The ModelSession provides access to all information that belongs to one specific model instance. It represents the model instance during runtime. Every ModelSession has a unique identifier that identifies the model. Besides that the ModelSession provides access to the event listeners of the model and one or more "model roots".

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns:
        the unique identifier of the corresponding model

      • getEventListeners

        EventListeners getEventListeners()
        Returns:
        the event listeners of this model

      • close

        void close()
        Close this model and free all resources used by this ModelSession. After a model is closed, the framework is free to cleanup all resources that might have been used by this model. ModelSession implementations should inform all (remotely) connected Models about the closing, close the associated EventDispatcher(s), release all associated model roots and omit all references to these model root instances.

      • setAttribute

        void setAttribute(String key,
                Object value)
        Change a custom user attribute of this ModelSession.
        Parameters:
        key - a key
        value - a value

      • getAttribute

        <T> T getAttribute(String key)
        Get the custom user attribute with the given key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of value
        Parameters:
        key - a key
        Returns:
        the value associated with the given key or null if there is no such value

      • setEventDispatcher

        void setEventDispatcher(EventDispatcher eventDispatcher)
        Set the event dispatcher that shall be used for this ModelSession.
        Parameters:
        eventDispatcher - an EventDispatcher

      • getEventDispatcher

        EventDispatcher getEventDispatcher()
        Returns:
        the EventDispatcher that is currently used for this ModelSession

        RefContext getRefContext()

      • setModelRoot

                Object modelRoot)
        Set the root object for the model with the given name.
        Parameters:

        modelRoot - root object

      • getModelRoot

        Object getModelRoot(String modelName)
        Get the root object of the model with the given name.
        Parameters:
        modelName - model name
        Returns:
        the root of the model with the given name.

      • getModels

        Map<String,Object> getModels()
        Return all models in this ModelSession.
        Returns:
        a map that maps all model names to the corresponding root object
